name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Skilled in **AWS**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Ansible**, and **Terraform**, I am a seasoned Full Stack Developer with 8 years of experience transitioning into a Senior Security Engineer role. My expertise includes developing secure, high-performance solutions in healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging **React**, **Node.js**, and **Python** technologies. I have a proven track record of building compliant applications with strong knowledge of security standards (HIPAA, PCI DSS, etc.) and infrastructure management using **GitLab** and **VMware**.

I excel in problem-solving and teamwork, demonstrating effective communication while leading the development of enterprise-grade platforms. My hands-on experience with **NGINX** for server management and troubleshooting includes implementing security mechanisms and enhancing system resilience. As a self-motivated professional, I continuously drive innovative solutions in secure application development and deployment.
